sen.j: 上京区（かみぎょうく）は、京都市を構成する11区のうちのひとつ。
sen.e: Kamigyo Ward is one of the eleven wards consitituting Kyoto City.
Kamigyo Ward is one of the eleven wards consitituting Kyoto City.
Kamigyo Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitute Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 市の中心部に位置し、かつての京都の北側に該当する。
sen.e: Located in the center of the city, Kamigyo Ward occupies the northen part of former Kyoto.
Located in the center of the city, Kamigyo Ward occupies the northen part of former Kyoto.
Located in the center of the city, Kamigyo Ward occupies the northern part of former Kyoto.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 東側には鴨川 (淀川水系)が流れる。
sen.e: Kamo-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) flows its east side.
Kamo-gawa River (in the Yodo-gawa River water system) flows on the east side.
Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system) flows on the east side.
sen.cmt: system 小文字にしました。

sen.j: 京都府庁もこの区に置かれている。
sen.e: The Kyoto Prefectural governent office is placed in this ward.
The Kyoto Prefectural governent office located in this ward.
The Kyoto Prefectural government office is located in this ward.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1879年（明治12年）4月10日 京都府に上京区ができる。
sen.e: April 10, 1897: Kamigyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.
April 10, 1897: Kamigyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.
April 10, 1897: Kamigyo Ward was established in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1889年（明治22年）4月1日 下京区と合併して京都市が発足。
sen.e: April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Sakyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.
April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Sakyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.
April 1, 1889: This ward was merged with Shimogyo Ward to inaugurate Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 下京区 としました。

sen.j: 上京区と下京区は共に京都市の行政区となる。
sen.e: Each of Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
Kamigyo Ward and Shimogyo Ward became an administrative ward of Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 下京区 としました。

sen.j: 1929年（昭和4年）4月1日 左京区を分区。
sen.e: April 1, 1929: Sakyo Ward was separated.
April 1, 1929: Sakyo Ward was separated.
April 1, 1929: Sakyo Ward was separated.

sen.j: また上京区と下京区の2区より中京区と東山区を分区する
sen.e: In addition, Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyam Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward.
In addition, Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyam Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Sakyo Ward.
In addition, Nakagyo Ward and Higashiyama Ward were generated by separating Kamigyo Ward and Shimogyo Ward.
sen.cmt: 下京区 としました。

sen.j: 1955年（昭和30年）9月1日 上京区から北区 (京都市)を分区する
sen.e: September 1, 1955: Kita ward (of Kyoto City) was generated by separating Kamigyo Ward.
September 1, 1955: Kita ward (of Kyoto City) was generated by separating Kamigyo Ward.
September 1, 1955: Kita Ward (Kyoto City) was generated by separating Kamigyo Ward.
sen.cmt: Ward 大文字にしました。
